entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.46.7
entry.content:
üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: Default value for array properties wasn't set correctly, crashing the UI for arrays(#7027) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.46.8
entry.content:
üß© Pieces

  • feat(hubspot): delete/get landing page/ site page actions (#6956) @kishanprmr
  • fix(google-drive): support shared drive files in list files action (#7016) @kishanprmr
  • feat: add support for claude 3.7 sonnet model (#7029) @kishanprmr

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: sync flow status with project state in project release (#7071) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix: data selector breaking when results contained null values (#7061) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: respond on continue in webhook (#7033) @abuaboud
  • fix: nullable project id (#7030) @abuaboud

üé® Enhancements & Polish

  • fix(project-release): update connection name without deleting credentails (#7032) @abuaboud

üßπ Maintenance & Dev Experience

  • fix: security upgrade axios from 1.7.8 to 1.8.2 (#7057) @abuaboud
  • chore(deps): bump prismjs from 1.29.0 to 1.30.0 (#7056) @dependabot
  • chore(deps): bump axios from 1.7.8 to 1.8.2 (#7035) @dependabot
  • [Snyk] Security upgrade axios from 1.7.8 to 1.8.2 (#7034) @abuaboud
  • fix: correct BuilderFlowStatusSection component displayName (#7037) @s31w4n

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @abuaboud, @dependabot, @dependabot[bot], @hazemadelkhalel, @kishanprmr, @s31w4n and @snyk-bot

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.47.0
entry.content:
‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat(tables): introduce the future of no-code automation database (#6597) @amrdb

üß© Pieces

  • fix(dust): update Dust error format after API change (#7089) @AdamSelene
  • fix: support duplicate query params for arrays (#7072) @danielpoonwj
  • feat(slack): new command trigger and get file action (#7080) @geekyme
  • feat: add Metabase get dashboard questions action (#7068) @valentin-mourtialon

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: check if jwt expired in current user (#7099) @abuaboud
  • fix: progress bar value usage limits (#7091) @hazemadelkhalel

üé® Enhancements & Polish

  • feat: allow to manual override notify status for embed users (#7096) @abuaboud
  • fix: remove icons from sidebar and show docs flag (#7090) @hazemadelkhalel
  • feat: make some improvements to the sidebar styling (#7083) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix: allow deleting single tables + introduce actions menu in /tables route (#7086) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üìö Documentation

  • docs: add danielpoonwj as a contributor for code (#7084) @allcontributors

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @AdamSelene, @abuaboud, @allcontributors, @allcontributors[bot], @amrdb, @danielpoonwj, @geekyme, @hazemadelkhalel, @kishanprmr and @valentin-mourtialon
